Summary: [Youtube link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
divs: Sighting DetailsI was filming my son and I frequently look at the sky, like looking at clouds, I started to film one and , well the video is there, unfortunately I had my flip with me, not my 60x, as you may know, objects in a flip cameras field of view is closer than it appears, I actually was just hoping I caught it, using reference points as I couldn't see it on the screen, the zoom in edit helps, thank-you for your time. PS I'm using my iPod , can't upload, and I must find the original on an external hdd. ======= MUFON note: We do not investigate UFO videos on Youtube or other external sites. Please upload the original, unedited video to our server. These uploads will still be viewable by the public if uploaded with original report.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Moncton
There were no other sightings in Moncton on or around July 7th 2011
